blogPost.excerpt: Meet Red: the only full-featured, professional Redis client written from the ground-up for the Mac! Red provides a powerful yet wonderfully simple interface to interact with Redis.
blogPost.body: Meet Red: the only full-featured, professional Redis client written from the ground-up for the Mac! Red provides a powerful yet wonderfully simple interface to interact with Redis.
blogPost.title: Red - A powerful and beautiful Redis client for Mac
blogPost.author: Stephen C. Mitchell

localize.description: Red：唯一一个从头到尾为Mac编写的全功能、专业的Redis客户端。Red提供了一个强大而又简单的界面来与Redis进行交互。
localize.tagline: 一个强大而漂亮的Mac版Redis客户端

localize.description: Red：唯一一個從頭到尾爲Mac編寫的全功能、專業的Redis客戶端。Red提供了一個強大而又簡單的界面來與Redis進行交互。
localize.tagline: 一個強大而漂亮的Mac版Redis客戶端

previous.excerpt: WOMBO is the world’s best AI-powered lip sync app 👨‍🎤👩‍🎤 All you have to do is add a selfie, pick a song, and let WOMBO work its magic. The result? Videos that are hilarious, bizarre, fun, and ready to go viral. No singing lessons required.
previous.title: WOMBO - Make your selfies sing

localize.description: WOMBO是世界上最好的人工智能驱动的唇语同步应用👨🎤Դ🎤，你要做的就是添加一张自拍照，选择一首歌曲，让WOMBO发挥它的魔力。结果呢？幽默、怪异、有趣的视频，随时可以传播。不需要任何歌唱课程。
WOMBO是世界上最好的人工智能驅動的脣語同步應用👨🎤Դ🎤，你要做的就是添加一張自拍照，選擇一首歌曲，讓WOMBO發揮它的魔力。結果呢？幽默、怪異、有趣的視頻，隨時可以傳播。不需要任何歌唱課程。

next.excerpt: Powerful mockup generator that lets you seamlessly mix and match different hand models with devices and backgrounds. Works on the macOS, Windows and Linux. Also available as a https://www.figma.com/c/plugin/786250770157843670/Mockuuups-Studio.
next.title: Mockuuups Studio 3.0 - Mockup generator with diverse hands & endless possibilities

localize.description: 强大的模拟生成器，让你可以将不同的手部模型与设备和背景进行无缝混合和匹配。适用于macOS，Windows和Linux。也可作为https://www.figma.com/c/plugin/786250770157843670/Mockuuups-Studio。
localize.tagline: Mockup生成器具有多种手感和无限的可能性。

localize.description: 強大的模擬生成器，讓你可以將不同的手部模型與設備和背景進行無縫混合和匹配。適用於macOS，Windows和Linux。也可作爲https://www.figma.com/c/plugin/786250770157843670/Mockuuups-Studio。
localize.tagline: Mockup生成器具有多種手感和無限的可能性。
